General Health5 Tips to Get Rid of Body Odour This SummerBody odour is one of the most prevalent problems during summer. However, diet modification, hygiene management, and the use of antiperspirants can help deal with it.  "https://www.apollo247.com/blog/article/tips-to-get-rid-of-body-odour" 
Special DaysPrevention of Blindness Week: Can Glaucoma Make You Blind?People suffering from glaucoma may not develop severe symptoms in the early stages. However, if left untreated, it can lead to blindness.   "https://www.apollo247.com/blog/article/can-glaucoma-make-you-blind" 
Special DaysWorld Autism Awareness Day: All You Need To Know About This DisorderAutism is a developmental disorder that can affect a child's ability to learn, communicate, and understand. However, therapy and medication can help manage the symptoms effectively.   "https://www.apollo247.com/blog/article/world-autism-awareness-day-all-you-need-know" 
General HealthWhat Causes Heat Stroke?Exposure to extremely hot weather can result in a heat stroke. It can be life-threatening, therefore requires immediate treatment.   "https://www.apollo247.com/blog/article/what-causes-heat-stroke" 
Special DaysWorld Tuberculosis Day - Everything You Need to Know About TBTB is an infectious disease that mainly affects the lungs and can be life-threatening. However, it can be successfully cured if diagnosed and treated properly on time.  "https://www.apollo247.com/blog/article/world-tuberculosis-day-everything-you-need-know-about-tb"
